<title level="1" right="Rules">[Hardness](/Rules.aspx?ID=215)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 277 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Whenever a shield takes damage, the amount of damage it takes is reduced by this amount. This number is particularly relevant for shields because of the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) feat. The rules for Hardness appear in [Item Damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=195).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
